item.title: How to choose a second language
item.description: So you’ve been programming for a while now and you want to explore what other languages are there. How do you choose? Do you choose based on how you think you might get a job? Or do you choose where all the “excitement” is? My advice? Find something that will change the way you think about programming. Most likely you’ve been writing in some form of object-oriented language. That’s great. It’s what the vast majority of professional software developers author in.
